meanings.definition: A member of the lanthanoid series of elements.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of the lanthanoid.
meanings.sent2: The lanthanoid was discovered in the laboratory last week.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student swapped the lanthanoid with a common metal in the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The lanthanoid stood out in the periodic table like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: In the chemistry class, the teacher made the students memorize the lanthanoid's position in the periodic table.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the lanthanoid series of elements.
meanings.sent1: The researcher conducted experiments on lanthanoid elements.
meanings.sent2: The lanthanoid properties were discussed in the scientific conference.
meanings.sent3: The colorful display showcased various lanthanoid elements in a unique way.
meanings.sent4: Her personality had a lanthanoid charm that captivated everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The lanthanoid characteristics made the element easy to identify in the lab.
